headline: Louisiana Community Development Authority Authorizes up to $402 Million in Revenue Bonds for Southern Energy Renewables’ Louisiana Fuel Project
summary: SACRAMENTO, Calif. & NEW ORLEANS, December 04, 2025--DevvStream Corp. (Nasdaq: DEVS) ("DevvStream"), a leading carbon management and environmental-asset monetization firm, and Southern Energy Renewables Inc. ("Southern"), a U.S.-based producer of low-cost fuels made from biomass, with a flagship Louisiana project that plans to utilize regional wood-waste biomass to deliver green methanol and carbon-negative sustainable aviation fuel ("SAF") at scale, today announced that the Louisiana Community
